item.title: Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast - Delicious Family Favorite
item.description: Indulge in this Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast that promises to impress your family at dinner. Its rich flavors and tender texture make it a standout dish. Try it tonight and elevate your mealtime experience!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breast
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
  3. Coat the chicken breasts with the mixture and place them in a baking dish.
  4. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top of the chicken.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and golden brown.
  6. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

item.title: Healthy Stuffed Chicken for Family
item.description: This roasted red pepper, spinach, and mozzarella stuffed chicken is a healthy delight! Packed with flavor and nutrition, it's perfect for weeknight dinners. Try it tonight and impress your family!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: 60 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken breasts
  • 1 cup fresh spinach, chopped
  • 1/2 cup roasted red peppers, diced
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix the spinach, roasted red peppers, and mozzarella cheese.
  3. Cut a pocket in each chicken breast and stuff with the spinach mixture.
  4. Season the chicken with salt and pepper, then drizzle with olive oil.
  5. Place the stuffed chicken in a baking dish and bake for 30-35 minutes until cooked through.

item.title: Melt-In-Your-Mouth Chicken for Busy Families
item.description: This melt-in-your-mouth chicken is a weeknight lifesaver! Juicy, tender, and bursting with flavor, it's a dish the whole family will adore. Try it tonight for a quick and delicious dinner!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 25 minutes

â° Total Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken breasts
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon dried thyme
  • 1 teaspoon dried rosemary
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
  2. Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, garlic, thyme, and rosemary.
  3. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes on each side until golden brown and cooked through.
